title: hmcl下不了forge
author: 傲世天帝
txt_content:
---- Hello Minecraft! Crash Report ----
  Version: 3.2.120
  Time: 2019-02-25 17:13:11
  Thread: Thread[forge-installer.jar,5,main]

  Content: 
    java.lang.IllegalStateException: Not on FX application thread; currentThread = forge-installer.jar

replies.author: Mike_Play_OK
replies.txt_content: HMCL上目前还没有1.13.2的Forge，推荐去官网下载
